attributes.title: GeoPointField
attributes.readMe:
# GeoPointField

A field type for storing and displaying geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude).

## Usage

### Basic Implementation

```gts
import { GeoPointField } from '../fields/geo-point';
import { CardDef, field, contains } from 'https://cardstack.com/base/card-api';

export class MyCard extends CardDef {
  @field location = contains(GeoPointField);
}
```

### Field Properties

- **lat**: Latitude coordinate (number)
- **lon**: Longitude coordinate (number)

### Display Formats

- **Atom**: Compact view with map icon and coordinates
- **Embedded**: Full view with interactive map and coordinate editing
- **Edit**: Form fields for latitude and longitude input

### Example Data

```json
{
  "lat": 37.7746,
  "lon": -122.4068
}
```

### Features

- Interactive map rendering using Leaflet
- Click-to-update coordinates
- Responsive design with Boxel UI components
- Support for custom tile servers
- Coordinate validation and formatting

### Map Interaction

The embedded view includes an interactive map where users can:
- View the current location
- Click to set new coordinates
- See coordinate popups on hover
- Update coordinates in real-time
